mapper.select: SELECT p.id, p.content, p.member_id, p.created_at, p.updated_at, m.nickname FROM posts p INNER JOIN members m ON p.member_id = m.id ORDER BY p.created_at DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
SELECT p.id, p.content, p.member_id, p.created_at, p.updated_at, m.nickname FROM posts p INNER JOIN members m ON p.member_id = m.id WHERE p.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO posts (content, member_id, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{content}, #{memberId}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt})
